The list/for_each.hpp header defines macros to repeat a macro for each element in a list.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/list/for_each.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH
  • BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_R
